1ç»„ 2ç»„ 3ç»„ 1ç»„ 2ç»„ 3ç»„ 1ç»„ 2ç»„ 3ç»„å³ä¸Šè¿°åºåˆ—åˆ†æˆ 3 ä¸ªç»„ï¼š[1,3,9], [6,7,8], [2,5,4] å¯¹æ‰€æœ‰çš„åˆ†ç»„è¿›è¡Œç›´æ¥æ’å…¥æ’åºã€‚ d = d / 2ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œç¬¬ 1 æ­¥ï¼Œç›´åˆ° d = 0ã€‚ æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦(n^1.3)ä¸ç¨³å®šæ’åºç®—æ³•ğŸŒç¤ºä¾‹ä»¥ä¸‹ç¤ºä¾‹å¯¹é˜Ÿåˆ— [1, 6, 2, 3, 7, 5, 9, 8, 4] è¿›è¡Œå¸Œå°”æ’åºè¿‡ç¨‹ï¼š12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031320x00 å¢é‡ d = 9 / 2 = 4, åˆ†ç»„æƒ…å†µå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š [1, 6, 2, 3, 7, 5, 9, 8, 4] 1ç»„ 2ç»„ 3ç»„ 4ç»„ 1ç»„ 2ç»„ 3ç»„ 4ç»„ 1ç»„------------------------------------------------------------0x01 å¢é‡ d = 4, 2ï¼Œå¯¹å„åˆ†ç»„è¿›è¡Œç›´æ¥æ’å…¥æ’åºã€‚ [1, 3, 2, 5, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9] 1ç»„ 2ç»„ 1ç»„ 2ç»„ 1ç»„ 2ç»„ 1ç»„ 2ç»„ 1ç»„------------------------------------------------------------0x05 å¢é‡ d = d / 2 = 2 / 2 = 1, åˆ†ç»„æƒ…å†µå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š [1, 3, 2, 5, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9] 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„------------------------------------------------------------0x06 å¢é‡ d = 1, å¯¹ä¸ªåˆ†ç»„è¿›è¡Œç›´æ¥æ’å…¥æ’åºã€‚ [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9] 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„ 1ç»„------------------------------------------------------------0x07 å¢é‡ d = d / 2 = 1 / 2 = 0, ç»“æŸæ’åºã€‚ [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9] ğŸŒå®ç°Javaå®ç°1234567891011121314151617181920212223// swap funcpublic void swap(int[] array, int lIndex, int rIndex) { int tmp = array[lIndex]; array[lIndex] = array[rIndex]; array[rIndex] = tmp;}// interface: shell sortpublic int[] shellSort(int[] nums) { int[] array = Arrays.copyOf(nums, nums.length); for(int d = array.length / 2; d > 0; d /= 2) { for(int i = 0 ; i < array.length; i += d) { for(int j = i; j > 0; j -= d) { if(array[j - d] > array[j]) swap(array, j - d, j); else break; } } } return array;} JavaScriptå®ç°123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627// swapconst swap = (array, lIndex, rIndex) => { const tmp = array[lIndex] array[lIndex] = array[rIndex] array[rIndex] = tmp}// interface: shell sortconst shellSort = (nums) => { const array = nums.map(e => e) for(let d = Math.floor(array.length / 2); d > 0; d = Math.floor(d / 2)) { for(let i = 0; i < array.length; i ++) { for(let j = i; j > d - 1; j -= d) { if(array[j - d] > array[j]) swap(array, j - d, j) else break } } } return array}// testconst nums = [123,12,3,5,62,2,67,234,234,234,12,1]const ret = shellSort(nums)console.log('ret', ret)

[7,9,8]è¢«8åˆ†å‰²ä¸º[7]å’Œ[9]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------0x30 [-] [-] [-] [-] [1, <2>, 3, <4>, <5>, <6>, 7, <8>, 9] ^pivot ^pivot ^pivot ^pivot // å­é˜Ÿåˆ—[1] [3] [7] [9] éƒ½åªåŒ…å«ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºå‡†å…ƒç´ ,ç›´æ¥è¿”å›.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------0x31 [<1>, <2>, <3>, <4>, <5>, <6>, <7>, <8>, <9>] // è·å¾—æ’å¥½é˜Ÿåˆ— ğŸ— å®ç°Java é€’å½’å®ç°12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940// swap funcprivate void swap(int[] array, int lIndex, int rIndex) { int tmp = array[lIndex]; array[lIndex] = array[rIndex]; array[rIndex] = tmp;}// partition funcprivate int partition(int[] array, int left, int right) { // é€‰å–åŸºå‡† int pivot = array[right]; int sIndex = right; // åˆ†å‰² while(left < right) { while(array[left] <= pivot && left < right) left ++; swap(array, left, sIndex); sIndex = left; // -- while(array[right] >= pivot && left < right) right --; swap(array, sIndex, right); sIndex = right; } return sIndex;}// quick sort, recursively funcprivate void quickSort(int[] array, int left, int right) { if(left >= right) return; int parIndex = partition(array, left, right); // é€’å½’ quickSort(array, left, parIndex - 1); quickSort(array, parIndex + 1, right);}// sort interfacepublic int[] sort(int[] nums) { int[] array = Arrays.copyOf(nums, nums.length); quickSort(array, 0, array.length - 1); return array;} JavaScript é€’å½’å®ç°123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839// swap funcconst swap = (array, lIndex, rIndex) => { const tmp = array[lIndex]; array[lIndex] = array[rIndex]; array[rIndex] = tmp;}// partition funcconst partition = (array, left, right) => { // é€‰æ‹©åŸºå‡† const pivot = array[right]; let sIndex = right; // åˆ†å‰² while(left < right) { while(array[left] <= pivot && left < right) left++; swap(array, left, sIndex); sIndex = left; // while(array[right] >= pivot && left < right) right--; swap(array, sIndex, right); sIndex = right; } return sIndex;}// quick sort, recursively funcconst quickSort = (array, left, right) => { if(left >= right) return; const parIndex = partition(array, left, right); quickSort(array, left, parIndex - 1); quickSort(array, parIndex + 1, right);}// sort interface funcconst sort = (nums) => { const array = nums.slice(); quickSort(array, 0, array.length - 1); return array;}

//ç¬¬7æ¬¡èµ°è®¿ï¼Œ //é€‰å–å½“å‰æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æœ€å¤§å€¼1å†’æ³¡åˆ°æœ€å ğŸ”ª ç®—æ³•å®ç°Javaå®ç°123456789101112131415161718// swapprivate void swap(int[] array, int lIndex, int rIndex) { int tmp = array[lIndex]; array[lIndex] = array[rIndex]; array[rIndex] = tmp;}// sort interfacepublic int[] bubbleSort(int[] nums) { int[] array = Arrays.copyOf(nums, nums.length); // bubble sort for (int i = 0; i < array.length; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < array.length - i - 1; j++) { if (array[j] > array[j + 1]) swap(array, j, j + 1); } } return array;} JavaScriptå®ç°1234567891011121314151617// swapconst swap = (array, lIndex, rIndex) => { const tmp = array[lIndex]; array[lIndex] = array[rIndex]; array[rIndex] = tmp;}// sort interfaceconst bubbleSort = nums => { const array = nums.slice(); // bubble sort for(let i = 0; i < array.length; i++) { for(let j = 0; j < array.length - i - 1; j++) if(array[j] > array[j + 1]) swap(array, j, j + 1); } return array;}
